sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit, OnDestroy } from "@angular/core"; @Component({ selector: "app-register", templateUrl: "register.component.html" }) export class RegisterComponent implements OnInit, OnDestroy { focus; focus1; focus2; constructor() {} ngOnInit() { var body = document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0]; body.classList.add("register-page"); } ngOnDestroy() { var body = document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0]; body.classList.remove("register-page"); } }

Marketing

We've created the marketing campaign of the website. It was a very interesting collaboration.

Fully Coded in HTML5

We've developed the website with HTML5 and CSS3. The client has access to the code using GitHub.

Built Audience

There is also a Fully Customizable CMS Admin Dashboard for this product.
